clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text:
We also use the services of companies who administer rewards and other incentive programs that enable the delivery of customizable and real-time content and offers to participants in their programs, including coupons and rebates.&nbsp.
Such companies collect and share information about your purchasing habits.&nbsp.
In some cases, this may include precise geographical location information from your phone or other mobile device in order to deliver relevant real-time content and offers to you.

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Information collected by cookies, beacons or other automated technology may be used by us or our promotional or advertising partners to deliver targeted advertising to you.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text: (3) our partners, advertisers or other companies for business or operational purposes,

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
We may amend these Terms from time to time.&nbsp.
In the event we make a change to these Terms, we will notify you by posting the revised Terms to the Website.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: This service tracks you on other websites
clauses.description: The service may use tracking technologies in third-party websites to track your online activity while you aren't visiting their Site.
clauses.clause_text: In cases when you are on the website of one of our promotional or advertising partners, our cookies or beacons may be placed on your computer via SC Johnson content that you may be viewing (e.g., a product promotion or advertisement).

case.text: This service tracks you on other websites

clauses.title: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out
clauses.description: There is a form to opt-out (typically California's CCPA) of the selling of your personal data. This is a bad a point because there are many services that don't have this form due to not selling your data in the first place.
clauses.clause_text: To the extent SC Johnson sells your personal information as the term “sell” is defined under the CCPA, you have the right to opt-out of the sale of your personal information by clicking this “Do Not Sell My Personal Information” link.

case.text: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text:
Any amendment to these Terms will be effective immediately upon the posting of the revised Terms to the Website.&nbsp.
If you do not agree with the changes made to these Terms, you should no longer use the Website.
Continued use of the Website after such changes to the Terms will constitute your acceptance of such changes

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: to use, edit, distribute, perform, display, incorporate, sublicense, and create derivative works of all or any portion of your Submission in any way that we see fit and for any purpose whatsoever.

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text:
• operating system
  • browsing behavior, like referring website information

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
clauses.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.
clauses.clause_text: Our websites may also have “plugins” and other website features from other companies, such as the Facebook “Like” button and Facebook Conversations and other features which allow for login or other website functionality or interactions with social networking sites.

case.text: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

clauses.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: We may receive information about you from other sources such as online retailers, public databases, data aggregators or resllers, or companies/websites where you have consented to have your information shared with other companies.

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Wisconsin, USA)
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms, and the agreement they create, shall be governed in all respects by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Wisconsin, U.S.A.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels and device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: (such as IP addresses and device IDs) through the use of automated technology like cookies and beacons.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: We may also disclose your information as part of a reorganization or sale of one of our business units, divisions or brands to another company.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.
clauses.clause_text: Regardless of any statute or law to the contrary, any claim or cause of action arising out of or related to the Website must be filed within one (1) year after such claim or cause of action arises or be forever barred and waived.

case.text: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

clauses.title: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account
clauses.description: The service may still use your content and display it after you stopped using it by closing your account. The case applies to terms requiring users to grant them a perpetual license over that content.
clauses.clause_text:
IF YOU SUBMIT MATERIAL TO US:

(1) You hereby provide us with a nonexclusive, worldwide, fully paid-up and royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable and unlimited license

case.text: A license is kept on user-generated content even after you close your account

clauses.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
clauses.description: Personal Data can be processed for many reasons, including non essential processing such as for advertising, marketing and analytics purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
review ad performance, delivery verification and measurement,
  • personalize your website experience through tailored content, ads and offers,
  • help you locate stores near you that sell our products,
  • communicate with you about your account and other matters, and in our discretion, changes to any SC Johnson policy that may affect you,
  • conduct research and analysis related to, and manage and improve, our websites, mobile applications, products, services, advertising, ecommerce product listings, promotions and sales, and understand how you interact with us through social media platforms, including, for example, to make our websites and mobile applications easier to use with better content by understanding how people use our websites, mobile applications, products and services and engage with us using social media and advertising,
  • process transactions and ship products to you,
  • manage online communities for the sharing and exchange of reviews, comments, feedback, ideas, and other user generated content,
  • administer programs and promotions for which you sign up, including sweepstakes and contests, and mobile applications for games and other online experiences,
  • implement other activities disclosed at the time you provide your information,
  • implement social networking features you have activated, and/or
  • combine all the information we collect or receive about you for any of the foregoing purposes.

case.text: Your personal information is used for many different purposes

clauses.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.
clauses.clause_text: We may share your personal information with (1) your consent, (2) our subsidiaries and affiliates,

case.text: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
clauses.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.
clauses.clause_text:
We may use information for various purposes to:

  • respond to your questions and requests,
  • provide you with information about our company, products, services, promotions and other special offers, including through the delivery of targeted advertising,

case.text: Your personal data is used for advertising

clauses.title: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly
clauses.description: User accounts can be terminated for having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly, meaning they cannot be terminated without a reason, but only for a limited number of reasons. Additionally, user accounts will not be deleted after a first infringement.
clauses.clause_text: terminating a user’s access to the Website and removing all Submissions submitted by any persons who we determine to be infringers or repeat infringers

case.text: User accounts can be terminated after having been in breach of the terms of service repeatedly

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What information may be collected

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text: SC Johnson podliježe Općoj uredbi o zaštiti podataka (GDPR),

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: This section of the Privacy Notice applies solely to individuals who are California residents. The terms in this section have the same meaning as defined in the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018, amendments to that Act and related regulations promulgated by the California Attorney General (collectively the “CCPA”). .

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

clauses.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
clauses.clause_text: • We can use such Submission in a website, digital, print or any other media throughout the world forever.

case.text: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future

clauses.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.
clauses.clause_text: You are fully responsible for all use of your account and for any actions that take place using your account, including, without limitation, as a result of any loss, theft, or unauthorized use of such login information.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text: SC Johnson websites do not currently honor Do Not Track settings that are enabled from your web browser.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: Online identifiers, like your IP addresses

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
